channel.title: CVE Feed for Trend Micro, Inc. -- Trend Micro Apex One
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Trend Micro, Inc. -- Trend Micro Apex One

item.title: CVE-2024-36302|2024-07-10T19:34:44.638Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description:
An origin validation vulnerability in the Trend Micro Apex One security agent could allow a local attacker to escalate privileges on affected installations.
Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
This vulnerability is similar to, but not identical to, CVE-2024-36303.

item.title: CVE-2024-37289|2024-07-10T19:34:48.731Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description:
An improper access control vulnerability in Trend Micro Apex One could allow a local attacker to escalate privileges on affected installations.
Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.

item.description:

item.title: CVE-2023-52094|2024-01-23T20:40:30.228Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20apex%20one
item.description:
An updater link following vulnerability in the Trend Micro Apex One agent could allow a local attacker to abuse the updater to delete an arbitrary folder, leading for a local privilege escalation on affected installations.
Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
